content: *this calendar blanket is made with mosaic crochet you can join the **free cal starting january 1st 2025 for 12 months** releasing 1 pattern part per month you can choose whether to make this pattern **regular or reversible overlay mosaic crochet** video and photo tutorials for both techniques are provided the pattern includes the written tutorial as well as the graph * **the pattern includes the written tutorial as well as the graph pdf also includes a bonus birthday panel as well as 6 stitch tutorials and 8 videos ** --> ** join the free cal or get the pdf more affordable here 1 ** > this pattern is part of the year-long > calendar blanket crochet along 2025 to > make a 66x74 inch blanket for > your loved ones or yourself this is > blanket will be done by christmas 2025 > the free cal s pattern includes ads and is only the regular overlay mosaic crochet pattern not the reversible > and the only way to get the > pattern **ad-free and printer-friendly** > is in the **pdf** the **pdf > is cheaper on my website ** ****only the pdf includes both the regular and the reversible pattern written and graph as well as the bonus birthday panel **** > so you can get the pdf here
